name: Apple Knight
overview: Epic Action Platformer! Apple Knight is a beautiful action platformer RPG for all ages. Explore vast levels filled with secrets, quests and loot. Defeat tough bosses. Fight wizards, knights, and monsters - or use traps to take them out from a safe distance! Features: - Upgrade armor, pets, weapons and abilities - Secret areas in every level - Smooth movement and animation - Endless Adventure game mode with random levels - Multiple difficulty modes - 2 playable characters
